orioledb/orioledb

cloud-native storage engine for PostgreSQL with modern hardware support and reduced maintenance

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • open source distributed SQL database with ACID transactions and horizontal scalability
  • Postgres platform for running apps and services inside the database
  • serves a REST API from a PostgreSQL database
  • automates PostgreSQL cluster deployment and management
  • Server for DuckDB with MySQL and Postgres protocols
  • Fast Postgres data streaming with CDC
  • Backups databases to multiple storage destinations with notifications
  • Cloud-based internet OS for files, apps, and web development
  • Rust framework for real-time Postgres replication
  • Cloud storage server with MongoDB and S3 support
